thread.title: Police investigate indecent act at northwest movie theatre Calgary
thread.title_full: Police investigate indecent act at northwest movie theatre | CTV Calgary News

title: Police investigate indecent act at northwest movie theatre Calgary
text:
Calgary police are looking for help from the public to identify a person of interest after receiving a report about a man masturbating in a theatre in the city’s northwest at the end of January.
Officers responded to Cineplex Odeon Crowfoot Crossing Cinemas on January 27 th at about 8:30 p.m. after someone spotted the man.
Police say he left the theatre through an emergency exit after he realized he was being watched.
The man is described as:
Caucasian In his 40s 170 to 175 cm or 5’7” to 5’9” tall Heavy build Light hair Wearing a black jacket and black pants Anyone with information on the identity of this person is asked to call the Calgary Police Service at 403-266-1234 or Crime Stoppers anonymously using any of the following methods:
TALK: 1-800-222-8477
TYPE: www.calgarycrimestoppers.org 
TEXT: 274637
Photos Police released CCTV photos of a person of interest in the hope he can be identified and questioned as part of the investigation.
